entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13 except minus 8 south of Hare Bay.
